document_title: Adrenal insufficiency: Causes, signs and treatments
subsection_content: Diagnosis of adrenal insufficiency includes: blood and urine tests to check adrenal hormone and ACTH levels; X-ray, ultrasound and MRI (magnetic resonance imaging).
subsection_title: suy tuyen thuong than.json. Methods of diagnosing adrenal insufficiency
subsection_data:
suy tuyen thuong than.json. Methods of diagnosing adrenal insufficiency
Diagnosis of adrenal insufficiency includes: blood and urine tests to check adrenal hormone and ACTH levels; X-ray, ultrasound and MRI (magnetic resonance imaging).
